<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataMR extends data { const CODE = 'MR'; const PREFIX = 222; const REGION = 'Africa'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:[2-4]\d\d|800)\d{5}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:25[08]|35\d|45[1-7])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '[2-4][0-46-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{5}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
